title: Create Professional About Us Page for Evergreen Hub

requirements.summary: Create AboutUs page component with six sections: Introduction, Our Mission, What We Offer, Why Choose Evergreen Hub, Our Vision for the Future, and Commitment to Transparency & Support. Content must be 500-700 words total, professional yet motivational tone, emphasizing honesty and transparency without exaggerated income claims.
acceptanceCriteria: Page contains exactly six sections in the specified order
Introduction section clearly describes Evergreen Hub as a digital learning and earning platform
Our Mission section articulates the platform's purpose and goals

What We Offer section lists services as bullet points: skill-based online courses, affiliate marketing opportunities, ready-made landing pages, training sessions and webinars, performance tracking dashboard, community and team support system
Why Choose Evergreen Hub section highlights unique value propositions
Our Vision for the Future section describes long-term aspirations
Commitment to Transparency & Support section emphasizes honest practices and user support
Total word count is between 500-700 words
Language is professional yet motivational without exaggerated income claims
Content emphasizes honesty and transparency

file_operations.description: Create new AboutUs page component with six distinct sections. Include Introduction (describing Evergreen Hub as digital learning and earning platform targeting students, beginners, job seekers, housewives), Our Mission (platform purpose and goals), What We Offer section with bullet points listing all services (skill-based courses, affiliate marketing opportunities, landing pages, training/webinars, performance tracking, community support), Why Choose Evergreen Hub (unique value propositions), Our Vision for the Future (long-term aspirations), and Commitment to Transparency & Support (honest practices). Content must be 500-700 words total, use professional yet motivational tone, avoid fake income promises or exaggerated claims like 'guaranteed income', and emphasize transparency throughout.

requirements.summary: Style AboutUs page with responsive mobile-first layout using existing green/black theme with emerald accents, Tailwind CSS, Inter font family, appropriate spacing and readability formatting across mobile, tablet, and desktop viewports.
acceptanceCriteria: Page uses existing green and black theme with emerald accents
Typography uses Inter font family consistently
Headings are styled with emerald green color (#10b981 or similar)
Sections have appropriate padding and margin spacing
Bullet points in 'What We Offer' section are properly formatted
Layout is responsive and adapts to mobile (< 768px), tablet (768px-1024px), and desktop (> 1024px) viewports
Design feels modern and inspiring, suitable for a startup brand

file_operations.description: Apply responsive mobile-first styling using Tailwind CSS classes consistent with existing design system. Use Inter font family (already configured in tailwind.config.js). Style headings with emerald green (#10b981 or text-emerald-500), apply appropriate container padding/margins for sections, format bullet points in What We Offer section with proper list styling, ensure responsive layout adapts across mobile (<768px), tablet (768px-1024px), and desktop (>1024px) breakpoints using Tailwind responsive prefixes (sm:, md:, lg:). Maintain modern, inspiring aesthetic suitable for startup brand.

requirements.summary: Integrate AboutUs page with existing ThemeContext for light/dark/system theme adaptation with proper color, background, and text styling that maintains consistency with the rest of the application.
acceptanceCriteria: About Us page respects current theme setting from ThemeContext
Colors adapt correctly in light mode (white background, dark text)
Colors adapt correctly in dark mode (dark background, white text)
Emerald green accents remain visible and appropriately styled in both themes
Theme transitions are smooth when user switches themes

file_operations.description: Import and integrate ThemeContext using useTheme hook. Apply theme-aware Tailwind classes using bg-background, text-foreground, bg-card, text-card-foreground and other CSS custom properties defined in frontend/src/index.css. Ensure emerald accent colors (text-emerald-500, border-emerald-500) remain visible in both light and dark modes. Use theme-aware classes for sections, headings, and body text to maintain visual consistency with existing application components (Header, Footer, etc.).

requirements.summary: Add /about-us route in App.tsx routing configuration that renders AboutUs page component, accessible to all users without authentication.
acceptanceCriteria: Route /about-us is defined in App.tsx routing configuration
Route renders the AboutUs page component
Route is publicly accessible without authentication
Route follows existing routing patterns and conventions

file_operations.description: Import AboutUs component from frontend/src/pages/AboutUs.tsx. Add new Route configuration in the TanStack Router setup with path='/about-us' that renders AboutUs component. Place the route alongside other public routes (like landing page and contact page) without ProtectedRoute wrapper to ensure public accessibility. Follow existing routing patterns used for Contact page and other public routes in the file.

requirements.summary: Update MobileSidebar navigation menu to change About Us link from '/#about' to '/about-us' route.
acceptanceCriteria: About Us link in MobileSidebar navigates to /about-us route
Link is functional and properly closes the mobile sidebar on click
Navigation works correctly on mobile and tablet viewports

file_operations.description: Locate the About Us navigation link in MobileSidebar component and update its href/to prop from '/#about' to '/about-us'. Ensure the link uses proper TanStack Router Link component for client-side navigation and that the sidebar closes on click (existing setIsOpen(false) logic should remain). Verify link functionality across mobile and tablet viewports.

requirements.summary: Update Footer Quick Links section to change About Us link from '/#about' to '/about-us' route.
acceptanceCriteria: About Us link in Footer Quick Links section navigates to /about-us route
Link styling is consistent with other footer links
Link is functional across all viewports

file_operations.description: Locate the About Us link in the Footer Quick Links section and update its href/to prop from '/#about' to '/about-us'. Ensure the link uses proper TanStack Router Link component for client-side navigation. Maintain consistent styling with other footer links (text color, hover effects, transitions). Verify link functionality across desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports.

requirements.summary: Add scroll-triggered fade-in animations with upward motion to AboutUs page sections using existing useScrollAnimation hook and cubic-bezier(0.4, 0.0, 0.2, 1) easing.
acceptanceCriteria: Each major section fades in when entering viewport
Fade-in includes slight upward motion animation
Animation uses cubic-bezier(0.4, 0.0, 0.2, 1) easing
Animation is optimized for 60fps mobile performance
Sections animate sequentially as user scrolls down the page

file_operations.description: Import useScrollAnimation hook from frontend/src/hooks/useScrollAnimation.ts. Apply the hook to each of the six major sections (Introduction, Our Mission, What We Offer, Why Choose Evergreen Hub, Our Vision, Commitment to Transparency). Use the isVisible state to conditionally apply animation classes. Implement fade-in with upward motion using Tailwind classes with opacity and transform (translate-y) transitions. Use cubic-bezier(0.4, 0.0, 0.2, 1) easing via transition-timing-function or custom Tailwind class. Ensure animations are GPU-accelerated (transform, opacity) for 60fps mobile performance. Sections should animate sequentially as user scrolls down.

requirements.summary: Add SEO meta tags to AboutUs page including descriptive title 'About Us - Evergreen Hub | Digital Learning & Earning Platform' and meta description highlighting platform mission and target audience with relevant keywords for search optimization.
acceptanceCriteria: Page title is set to 'About Us - Evergreen Hub | Digital Learning & Earning Platform' or similar
Meta description is present and describes the platform's mission and target audience
Meta description mentions key terms: digital learning, earning platform, affiliate marketing, online courses
Meta description is between 150-160 characters for optimal SEO
Open Graph and Twitter card meta tags are included for social sharing

file_operations.description: Use React Helmet or similar meta tag management approach to set page-specific SEO metadata. Set document title to 'About Us - Evergreen Hub | Digital Learning & Earning Platform'. Add meta description (150-160 characters) highlighting platform mission to empower students, beginners, job seekers, housewives with skill-based courses and affiliate marketing opportunities. Include keywords: digital learning, earning platform, affiliate marketing, online courses, skill development. Add Open Graph meta tags (og:title, og:description, og:type='website', og:url) and Twitter card meta tags (twitter:card='summary_large_image', twitter:title, twitter:description) for social sharing optimization.

requirements.summary: Emphasize target audience (students, beginners, job seekers, housewives, aspiring online earners) and clearly present seven service offerings in About Us content with motivational yet realistic tone avoiding fake income promises.
acceptanceCriteria: Content explicitly mentions all target audiences: students, beginners, job seekers, housewives, and aspiring online earners
All seven service offerings are clearly listed in the What We Offer section
Language is motivational but avoids unrealistic promises
No phrases like 'guaranteed income', 'get rich quick', or similar exaggerated claims
Emphasis on transparency, honest expectations, and genuine support

file_operations.description: Review and refine content in AboutUs component to explicitly mention all target audiences (students, beginners, job seekers, housewives, anyone wanting to start online earning) in Introduction section. In What We Offer section, ensure all seven services are listed as bullet points: skill-based online courses, affiliate marketing opportunities, ready-made landing pages, training sessions and webinars, performance tracking dashboard, community and team support system. Use motivational language while avoiding unrealistic promises like 'guaranteed income' or 'get rich quick'. Emphasize transparency, honest expectations about effort required, and genuine support throughout all sections. Maintain professional yet encouraging tone that builds trust.
